CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Bakkt Holdings Inc is a digital asset marketplace that enables consumers to buy, sell, store, and spend digital assets. The company retail platform Bakkt App amplifies consumer spending and bolsters loyalty programs, adding value for stakeholders within the Bakkt payments and digital assets ecosystem.
